game.name: PARRY COUNTER
game.categories: Single-player, Full controller support, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: PARRY COUNTER is a 2D side-scrolling Soulslike action game that puts your timing to the ultimate test. Master perfect parries to deflect enemy strikes and challenge a relentless boss rush. Every battle tests your skill, precision, and courage. Will you rise to counter every attack?
